trends: Draped saree-inspired silhouettes paired with oversized blazers and tailoring
Neon streetwear accents in earthy palettes
Handloom textiles in lightweight, breathable silhouettes
Modular trench coats with kurta-elements and modular layering
Wide-leg cargos in sustainable fabrics and neutral tones
season_styling_notes: Mix breathable fabrics with tailored layers; day-to-night transitions via lightweight drapes and statement accessories; combine ethnic jewelry with streetwear sneakers.
cultural_highlights: Handloom textures (khadi, ikat) integrated into Western silhouettes
Ethnic print accents (bandhani, block prints) on outerwear
Chikankari or mirror-work detailing in statement pieces
